channel.title: Windows 2003 VPS - cmd opening and closing?
channel.description:
Since no one could help me with my Linux CentOS VPS issues, I decided to get a Windows 2003 VPS and I've ran into another problem. I've downloaded the source I want and I try to run the server with run.bat. When I double click on run.bat, the cmd appears and disappears rapidly. Any suggestions?
And it isn't the source because I've tried multiple sources.

item.title: Windows 2003 VPS - cmd opening and closing?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

@echo off color 0a title StabbingScape V4 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

That’s the run.bat file at the moment, what must I change?

Oh and disregard the source I’m using at the moment, it’s for testing purposes only.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 2003 VPS - cmd opening and closing?

item.title: Windows 2003 VPS - cmd opening and closing?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Make sure the path to java in the batch file corresponds to the path on the VPS.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 2003 VPS - cmd opening and closing?
